casebody.data:
578 A.2d 1195 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Paul William OTTINGER. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 24,

Sept. Term, 1987.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Sept. 12, 1990.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment from the practice of law filed by Paul William Ottinger in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 12th day of September, 1990

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Paul William Ottinger be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Paul William Ottinger from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
